snippet: The Breeders’ Cup will remain at Santa Anita in California in 2014, for the third consecutive year.
abstract: Breeders' Cup will remain at Santa Anita in California in 2014, for the third consecutive year.
lead_paragraph: The Breeders’ Cup will remain at Santa Anita in California in 2014, for the third consecutive year.

headline.seo: Breeders’ Cup Is Staying Put at Santa Anita
